settings.heading: Package includes:
settings.content:
• 12 different rum samples of 25ML each (34%-40% Vol.)
  • Booklet with detailed explanation of each rum sample
  • Luxury gift box

üö© Made in the Netherlands

settings.heading: Delivery information
settings.content:
What are the usual delivery times?

For orders of in-stock products, the delivery time is usually fast and can vary between 1 to 4 business days, depending on the chosen shipping method and the destination.

Satisfaction Guaranteed or Your Money Back

If the product has not yet been shipped and you have not received the shipping confirmation email, you can request to cancel your order by contacting us.

If you have received the product and no longer like it or wish to exchange it, you have 30 days to return it to us.

Simply send us a message through the contact page so we can provide you with a return label, completely at our expense.

Once we receive the package, we can proceed with an exchange or issue you a full refund.

settings.custom_liquid:
<script>
// Comprehensive cart debugging
(function() {
  console.log('üîç Cart debugger loaded');
  
  // Method 1: Intercept form submission
  document.addEventListener('submit', function(e) {
    if (e.target.matches('form[action*="/cart/add"]')) {
      console.log('üìã FORM SUBMIT DETECTED');
      console.log('Form:', e.target);
      
      const formData = new FormData(e.target);
      console.log('=== Form Data Being Sent ===');
      for (let [key, value] of formData.entries()) {
        console.log('  ' + key + ':', value);
      }
      
      const variantId = formData.get('id');
      console.log('üéØ Variant ID being added:', variantId);
      
      // Look up what this variant should be
      fetch('/products/whisky-tasting-gift-box-12-tubes.js')
        .then(r => r.json())
        .then(p => {
          const v = p.variants.find(x => x.id == variantId);
          if (v) {
            console.log('üì¶ This variant is:', v.title, '- Price:', v.price / 100);
          }
        });
    }
  }, true);
  
  // Method 2: Intercept fetch/AJAX requests
  const originalFetch = window.fetch;
  window.fetch = function(...args) {
    const url = args[0];
    
    if (typeof url === 'string' && url.includes('/cart/add')) {
      console.log('üåê AJAX CART ADD DETECTED');
      console.log('URL:', url);
      
      if (args[1] && args[1].body) {
        console.log('Body:', args[1].body);
        
        // If it's FormData
        if (args[1].body instanceof FormData) {
          for (let [key, value] of args[1].body.entries()) {
            console.log('  ' + key + ':', value);
          }
        }
        // If it's JSON
        else if (typeof args[1].body === 'string') {
          try {
            const data = JSON.parse(args[1].body);
            console.log('JSON data:', data);
            console.log('üéØ Variant ID in AJAX:', data.id);
          } catch(e) {}
        }
      }
    }
    
    return originalFetch.apply(this, args);
  };
  
  // Method 3: Intercept XMLHttpRequest
  const originalXHR = window.XMLHttpRequest;
  window.XMLHttpRequest = function() {
    const xhr = new originalXHR();
    const originalSend = xhr.send;
    
    xhr.send = function(data) {
      if (xhr._url && xhr._url.includes('/cart/add')) {
        console.log('üì° XHR CART ADD DETECTED');
        console.log('Data:', data);
      }
      return originalSend.apply(this, arguments);
    };
    
    const originalOpen = xhr.open;
    xhr.open = function(method, url) {
      xhr._url = url;
      return originalOpen.apply(this, arguments);
    };
    
    return xhr;
  };
})();
</script>

settings.text: Our whisky tasting collection is a finely curated selection of some of the best Single malt whisky's.

custom_css: .product__price,.product-price,.price,.product__info-container .price,.product-form__price {text-align: center !important; justify-content: center !important; display: flex !important; flex-direction: column !important; align-items: center !important;}

settings.heading: Taste
settings.text: Each tasting set from El Cartel is carefully put together by experts, ensuring a varied and refined flavor experience.

settings.heading: Learn
settings.text: The whisky and rum tastings come with a booklet containing details about each drink, helping you discover and appreciate all the flavors.

settings.heading: Enjoy, or gift the joy
settings.text: The luxurious gift box and carefully selected drinks make it a perfect gift for any occasion, creating a special and enjoyable experience.

settings.heading: 1. What is included in an El Cartel tasting gift box?
settings.row_content: Each El Cartel tasting gift box contains carefully curated liquor samples in 25ml bottles, arranged in a luxury box. You'll also find an informative guide detailing the origin, tasting notes, and unique characteristics of each selection, helping you experience each sample fully.

settings.heading: 2. What types of tasting gift boxes do you offer?
settings.row_content: El Cartel offers two distinct tasting boxes : a whisky tasting box and a rum tasting box. Each tasting box includes a variety of high-quality, hand-picked samples to ensure a refined tasting experience.

settings.heading: 3. Is El Cartel suitable for corporate gifts or special events?
settings.row_content: Absolutely. Our tasting gift boxes make thoughtful and elegant gifts for clients, partners, or event attendees. Contact us for bulk order options and to add a customized message.

settings.heading: 4. Who is El Cartel's tasting gift box ideal for?
settings.row_content: Our whisky tasting boxes and rum tasting boxes are perfect for anyone interested in exploring high-quality liquors in an accessible yet sophisticated way. They make great gifts for enthusiasts or anyone curious about whisky or rum.

settings.heading: 5. Is 25ML enough for tasting?
settings.row_content: Yes, 25ml is generally considered a perfect amount for tasting. This portion size provides enough of the liquor to capture its full flavor profile, allowing you to appreciate its aroma, body, and finish without overwhelming the palate. It's also commonly used in professional tastings, where the goal is to sample and compare flavors rather than to consume in large quantities.
